Package org.jamwiki.db

Provides classes needed for all database interaction.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryHandler
    This interface provides all methods needed for retrieving, inserting, or updating data from the database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnsiDataHandler
    Default handler for ANSI SQL compatible databases.
    AnsiDataValidator
    Utility methods for validating data prior to committing it to the database.
    AnsiQueryHandler
    Default implementation of the QueryHandler interface for retrieving, inserting, and updating data in the database.
    CacheQueryHandler
    Cach√©-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    DatabaseConnection
    This class provides methods for retrieving database connections, executing queries, and setting up connection pools.
    DatabaseUpgrades
    This class simply contains utility methods for upgrading database schemas (if needed) between JAMWiki versions.
    DB2400QueryHandler
    DB2/400-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    DB2QueryHandler
    DB2-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    H2QueryHandler
    H2-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    HSqlQueryHandler
    HSQL-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    LocalDataSource
    Extension of the Commons DBCP BasicDataSource class that initializes itself from the JAMWiki Environment.
    MSSqlQueryHandler
    Microsoft SQL Server-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    MySqlQueryHandler
    MySQL-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    OracleQueryHandler
    Oracle-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    PostgresQueryHandler
    Postgres-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    SybaseASAQueryHandler
    Sybase ASA-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
    WikiDatabase
    This class contains general database utility methods that are useful for a variety of JAMWiki database functions, including setup and upgrades.

Package org.jamwiki.db Description

Provides classes needed for all database interaction. Note that database-specific SQL is stored in properties file which include /WEB-INF/classes/sql.ansi.properties, and these SQL files are loaded by a database-specific implementation of the QueryHandler interface.
